front.title: IPPM Considerations for the IPv6 PDM Destination Option

abstract.t: To assess performance problems, measurements based on optional sequence numbers and timing may be embedded in each packet. Such measurements may be interpreted in real-time or after the fact. An implementation of the existing IPv6 Destination Options extension header, the Performance and Diagnostic Metrics (PDM) Destination Options extension header has been proposed in a companion document. This document specifies the field limits, calculations, and usage of the PDM in measurement.
